text:
Hello,

I am working with a client that has a specific module on a Landing Page. She couldn't add this module to a "regular" page, and at first we thought the module was LP only.
However, I cannot find this module anywhere in the Design Tools. I have checked the Landing Page's template to check if maybe the "name" was different in the page editor only, but couldn't find it there.
I realized I can't even add this module in the very Landing Page it's currently on. It's a "Recent Blog Posts" module and I wonder if this might be some old module that no longer exists?

It made me wonder, is it possible that a module no longer exists in the Design Tools, but is still working on the site?
No, it's not. once you delete the modules files the module on your page won't work
If I wanted to create a HTML Sitemap based on Advanced menus can I print those menus on a template using a standard HubSpot module? Can someone send me an article on how to handle that
